original_title: When Football Changed Forever - The Story of the 1991/1992 Football Division One Season
overview: The dramatic story of the 1991/92 Football League Division One season - the final campaign before the Premier League began. Leeds United overcame fierce rivals Manchester United to emerge as champions, thanks to a certain Frenchman named Eric Cantona, but behind the scenes, the makeup of English League football was to change forever.
title: When Football Changed Forever - The Story of the 1991/1992 Football Division One Season
